answers.answer: First time, swelling wouldn't go away, I felt generally unwell with a headache that wouldn't go away, I kept being blinded by white spots, my bp was 170/140 and I had an above normal amount of protein in urine. This time I only had a little bit of swelling, headache, white spots and bp was 160/90, and protein.

question: Ladies who have had preeclampsia how did u know something was for sure wrong and not just normal swelling?
title: preeclampsia
